remarks: Condition for an operation to be a set.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jun-2019.)
statement:
opabex2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
opabex2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
opabex2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> x e. A ) $.
opabex2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> y e. B ) $.
opabex2 $p |- ( ph -> { <. x , y >. | ps } e. _V ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph x y $.
